## Related

- [repeat-cli](https://github.com/sindresorhus/repeat-cli) - CLI for this module
=======
## CLI

```sh
$ npm install --global repeating
```

```
$ repeating --help

  Usage
    repeating <string> <count>

  Example
    repeating 'unicorn ' 2
    unicorn unicorn 
```
>>>>>>> 16a22f1a2827e4eddfc089d7e2423b046879a4ce
